attributes.action: Make St Georges Day a national holiday!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nearly every country in the world has a national holiday to celebrate there heritage and all that is good about there country and its about time we in England had the chance to do the same.
You only have to look at the patriotisim around the country during a world cup/wimbledon/the ashes etc to see how proud we are as a nation yet this is the only time we can express it! 
So come on please get behind this petition and lets make April 23rd from now on a national holiday. I propose that if an extra day cannot be accomodated then scrap the mayday bank holiday for it!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
